Description:
Detects a write of an Exchange CSR to an untypical directory or with aspx name suffix which can be used to place a webshell

Author: Max Altgelt (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Certificate Request Export to Exchange Webserver
Query: sourcetype='windows-msexchange-management' eql select * from _source_ where (( = 'new-exchangecertificate' and  = ' -generaterequest' and  = ' -binaryencoded' and  = ' -requestfile') and (log like '%\\\\localhost\\c$%' or log like '%\\\\127.0.0.1\\c$%' or log like '%c:\\inetpub%' or log like '%.aspx%'))
